name: Sleep Problems
description: Misaligned circadian rhythm often is associated with difficulties falling asleep, waking up and excessive daytime sleepiness.

name: Low Energy
description: Circadian rhythm disorders are associated with fatigue and reduced cellular energy production.

name: Weight Gain
description: An irregular circadian rhythm greatly contributes to obesity, insulin resistance and metabolic disorders.

name: Low Mood
description: Circadian disruption often contributes to depression, anxiety, bipolar disorder and seasonal affective disorder

name: Aging
description: Out-of-sync circadian rhythm is associated with aging and morbidity while good circadian health is paramount to longevity.

name: + Every modern disease
description: From cardiovascular disorders to cancer. Sounds incredible? Just Google “circadian rhythm” + any ailment.
